Message.Title: This is BAD.
Message.Msg: Down every day as markets surge. In the midst of a huge retracement IMO. What's going to happen to T when the markets stop rocketing up every day? This will get crushed. It's very dangerous to speculate on stocks that miss earnings. Earnings are everything with high dividend stocks. A 5% divy doesn't help much as T loses a couple of % every week.
Yes 5% divy is great - but not when you're losing 1% or more every week - DUH!

Message.Msg: ...The Holy Trinity of the Far Right – Rush Limbaugh, Glen Beck & Sean Hannity…the Father, the Son and the Holy embodiment of H.L. Mencken’s opinion that, “Nobody ever went broke underestimating the intelligence of the American public. “ All three make millions and millions of dollars preaching fear, paranoia and intolerance, all disguised in a monotheistic message of jingoistic patriotism and contempt for government and disdain for education. Why is that do you suppose? Well, mainly for the money, but also because none of them ARE educated and, while they saber rattle constantly, they all somehow managed to avoid actually serving their country. Rush Limbaugh Education: Two semesters at Southeast Missouri State U. – His mom said, “He flunked everything.” Military Service: None Glen Beck Education: Enrolled and soon withdrew from one college course, “Early Christology" (?) Military Service: None Sean Hannity Education: a seminary high school, followed by dropping out of, not one but two universities, NYU and Adelphi Military Service: None Preach on, hypocrites.

Topic.Title: IRS Black Ops unit of Obama SS attacks conservatives.

Message.Msg: When a small anti-abortion group in Iowa sought nonprofit status, the Internal Revenue Service asked its board to promise not to organize protests outside Planned Parenthood and demanded to know how its prayer meetings and protest signs were educational. U.S. Sen. Charles Grassley, R-Iowa, said Tuesday the IRS was out of bounds in seeking information on the group's prayer activities and a guarantee that it wouldn't protest at Planned Parenthood. "That's outrageous that that statement would be made by anybody in government, that somehow you've got to compromise your First Amendment rights," Grassley said. "It appears the IRS offered this group a quid pro quo: you can become a charity if you don't protest in front of a Planned Parenthood." The Iowa group isn't the only anti-abortion organization that appears to have been singled out for scrutiny. In 2011, IRS singled out asked Christian Voices for Life of Fort Bend County in Texas and Texas groups faced unfair IRS intrusion into their activities because of "political and religious bias" that chilled their constitutional rights.
I wonder how many times he has to be told T didn't miss EPS estimates.

However, you don't have the excuse of senility or having been limited to an educational system meant for 1950's era farmers. Better?

Of course I do. All of the available evidence points to this. These were all field operations managed by field personnel. Why do you think Obama would be personally involved in any of these things? As I have said before, just because some Tea Brains decided to get their undies in a twist does not mean something warrants Presidential attention. This IRS thing is a case in point. The targeting ended in May 2012, due to internal IRS management ending the process at the field office. IRS management also asked the IG to review the incident to make further improvements. Sounds really nice. I'm stuck in a depressing defunct mining town in Virginia with a gassy 15 year old Rat Terrier as my only company. The high point of my life is looking out the living room window and waiting for the mailman every day. Sometimes my Social Security check comes and I can run down to the store and buy ammo. Even if it's just a couple of 22 shells, anything to do with guns is like German kink porn for me. It's the only thing that makes me feel alive and I cannot get enough..(!!) I know it's a sad life, which is both small and constantly diminishing but it's the best I could put together with my being essentially uneducated, functionally illiterate and steeped in the myth that my white American "male" superiority would guarantee me riches...oh, that and my "good looks". TeeHee..(!!)
Yes. I "English" a lot. Usually when I am playing pocket "pool" and I need to get a good "spin"..on the ball. I only have one after the accident with the "puppy"..(!!)
She sounds like "SHE" got sand on her "MaryJanes". Momma always spanked me when I did that..(!!)..Grins..

Message.Title: Another proud Republican Senior!
Message.Msg: LUBBOCK, Texas (AP) — The driver of a parade float involved in a train wreck that killed four war veterans in West Texas told investigators the oncoming train appeared to be stationary, and that he didn't notice anything was wrong until he saw people jumping from the float, according to documents released Wednesday. Imagine that, didn't see the train coming - thought time had stopped in the '50's apparently. Definitely a Republican, most likely a TeaAss..(!!)..Tee Hee..
